description: Creates AFNI bricks from RealTime GE EPI series.

dir_number.title: Directory Number
dir_number.description: The directory number where the first image of the series is stored

first_image_number.title: First Image Number
first_image_number.description: The number of the first image in the series

num_slices.title: Number of Slices
num_slices.description: The number of slices making up the imaged volume

num_reps.title: Number of Reps
num_reps.description: The number of samples in your time series

output_root.title: Output Root
output_root.description: The prefix for the output brick

keep_prefix.title: Keep Prefix Flag
keep_prefix.description: Forces @RenamePanga to use the prefix you designate without modification

interactive.title: Interactive Flag
interactive.description: Launches to3d in interactive mode. This allows you to double check the automated settings.

outliers_check.title: Outliers Check Flag
outliers_check.description: Performs outliers check and writes the outliers to a .1D file placed in the output directory

slice_pattern.title: Slice Pattern
slice_pattern.description: Sets the slice acquisition pattern. The default option is alt+z.

output_directory.title: Output Directory
output_directory.description: Directory where the output (bricks and 1D files) will be stored. The default directory is ./afni
